channel.title: Projects on William Maddock
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on William Maddock

item.title: Personal Portfolio Site: A Meta Adventure in Self-Promotion
item.description: Built this very site you're on—a fast, responsive Hugo-powered portfolio showcasing my journey in tech, deployed on GitHub Pages for maximum fun and flair.

item.title: Applied Data Science Capstone – SpaceX Launch Analysis
item.description: Developed a data science pipeline for SpaceX launch prediction using Python, machine learning, and interactive dashboards.

item.title: Cosmic Universalism: Computational Intelligence Initiative
item.description: Founded an initiative to build ethical, scalable cloud-native systems using Rust, Kubernetes, and AWS.

item.title: Secure Access Management System
item.description: Founded and developed a Rails-based web app with role-based access control and accessibility-first design.

item.title: Auraria Mobile Parking (AMP) - Team Project
item.description: Led development of a Kotlin-based mobile app for MSU Denver’s CS4360, streamlining campus parking with real-time features.
